author: heilman
body: Since the miniAOD drops some of the constituent particles from high eta jets, when the function reco::Jet.GetJetConstituentsQuick() executes it returns references to the constituent particles defined in reconstruction but does not check to see if any of these have been dropped and thus are not valid references.  This fix calls the sourceCandidatePtr and checks isNonnull() and isAvailable() inside getJetConstituentsQuick() before passing the candidates to the return statement.  If the candidatePtr is bad, a warning is thrown and the candidate is not passed to return.  This allows for getJetConstituentsQuick() to run over miniAOD and not halt runtime.
title: Check for valid pointers in Jet Constituents
